DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the safety and efficacy of 3 doses of AGN-199201 once and twice daily compared to vehicle for the treatment of moderate to severe facial erythema associated with rosacea.
DOC.brief_title: AGN-199201 for the Treatment of Erythema With Rosacea
DOC.criteria: Redness of the skin caused by rosacea â‰¥3 inflammatory lesions Laser lightsource or other energy based therapy in the last 6 months Any prescription or over the counter product for the treatment of acne or rosacea in the last 14 days
